glsa.title: CUPS: Leakage of sensitive information
glsa.synopsis: CUPS leaks information about user names and passwords when using remote printing to SMB-shared printers which require authentication.

background.p: The Common UNIX Printing System (CUPS) is a cross-platform print spooler.

description.p: When printing to a SMB-shared printer requiring authentication, CUPS leaks the user name and password to a logfile.

impact.p: A local user could gain knowledge of sensitive authentication data.

workaround.p: There is no known workaround at this time.

resolution.p: All CUPS users should upgrade to the latest version:
